text: "What Am I Living For" is a 1958 song by Chuck Willis and went to number 9 in the United States and number 1 on the R&B; charts. It has been covered by numerous artists since its release. ==References== Category:1958 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Conway Twitty songs Category:Percy Sledge songs Category:Ray Charles songs Category:Billy Fury songs Category:Solomon Burke songs Category:The Animals songs Category:The Band songs Category:The Everly Brothers songs Category:Van Morrison songs Category:Wanda Jackson songs Category:Alan Price songs
title: What Am I Living For
